text: Things like '_init_with_figure' should be private, to have lighter tab-completion.
title: Rename all the non-user facing methods in the Slicers to private functions

text:
Can you give an example. Couldn't figure out what Slicers mean. Do you mean functions like this - [Link1](https://github.com/nilearn/nilearn/blob/master/nilearn/decomposition/dict_learning.py#L31)

Or methods like this - [Link2](https://github.com/nilearn/nilearn/blob/master/nilearn/decomposition/dict_learning.py#L163)
